name: EMPLOYERS COUNCIL ON FLEXIBLE COMPENSATION
description: Non-profit membership association representing and promoting flexible compensation.

COBRA subsidies; H.R. 1319 - American Rescue Plan Act of 2021; P.L. 117-2.

Health Savings Accounts (HSAs); Flexible Spending Accounts (HSAs); transit benefits; Dependent Care FSAs (DCFSAs); Cobra subsides; PL 117-2 (American Rescue Plan); HR 384 (Bicycle Commuter Act of 2021); HR 848 (GREEN Act of 2021); HR 373 (Protecting  Individuals and Families Act); access to health savings accounts for seniors, veterans in Tricare and those in the Indian Health Service program; HR 2121 (Improving Child Care for Working Families Act of 2021).
